name: COVID-19 Data Portal
description: A resource providing rapid and open data sharing for SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19 research, facilitating access to biomolecular datasets, including genome, protein, and other experimental data. It is part of the European COVID-19 Data Platform and managed by EMBL-EBI.
owner_name: EMBL-EBI (European Molecular Biology Laboratory – European Bioinformatics Institute)
